title: Project Summary
description: Provides high-level summary information about the project's manifests and pack configuration.

fields.title: Resource Manifest
fields.description: Summary of the resource pack manifest.json including name, description, UUID, and version information.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains formatted manifest details including name, description, UUID, and version

fields.title: Behavior Manifest
fields.description: Summary of the behavior pack manifest.json including name, description, UUID, version, and script module dependencies.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains formatted manifest details including name, description, UUID, version, and dependencies
